mapper.insert: INSERT INTO music_table(music_id, music_name, music_artist, music_album, music_time, music_track, genre_id, mood_id, weather_id) VALUES(NULL, #{music_name}, #{music_artist}, #{music_album}, #{music_time}, #{music_track}, #{genre_id}, #{mood_id}, #{weather_id})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM music_table ORDER BY music_artist
